item.title: ZAC, the Zombie Apocalypse Computer
item.description:
ZAC is an open-source, self-contained survival computer designed to operate completely off-grid.

Built around a Raspberry Pi 5, ZAC integrates a local AI assistant, mesh radio communication, software-defined radio, offline knowledge archives, and GPS navigation into a ruggedized Pelican case. No internet required. No cloud dependencies. No subscriptions.

ZAC OS provides a unified interface for all system functions:

  • Local LLM for queries and assistance
  • Offline Wikipedia, survival references, and medical guides
  • LoRa mesh communication with other ZAC units
  • SDR for monitoring aircraft, weather satellites, and emergency broadcasts
  • GPS navigation with offline maps

Fully open source. Fully offline. Field-serviceable.
